document_data.name: Illasera
document_data.mainbody: '''Illasera''' was an [[elven]] [[Bhaalspawn]] who emerged as a member of the group known as [[the Five]] during the midâ€“14{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Personality: She was supremely confident in her abilities and prowess in battle.
document_data.Possessions: Illasera wore a suit of ''[[elven chainmail]]''.<ref group="note">In the ''[[Baldur's Gate II: Throne of Bhaal (novel)|Throne of Bhaal]]'' novel, Illasera wielded a bow and arrows that were inscribed with runes along the shatf.
document_data.Relationships: She was seen as one of the weaker members of the Five, and was held in low regard by the [[Bhaal]]ist priestess [[Amelyssan]].

History.The Echo:
[[File:Murder tribunal.png|thumb|''Amelyssan, Illasera, and Sendai, with Sarevok on the Tribunal's throne.''|450x450px]]

In the late 15{{th}} century DR, a collection of Bhaalspawn: [[Amelyssan]], [[Abazigal]], Illasera, and [[Sendai]], were brought back as bloodied echoes of their former selves by [[Sarevok Anchev]], placing them on the [[Murder Tribunal]], hidden deep within [[Baldur's Gate]]'s [[Undercellar]], in the ruins of the [[Temple of Bhaal (Undercity)|Temple of Bhaal]].
